import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' const Context_data=React.createContext(); const url="http://localhost:3001/users" const Hooks=()=> { const [empdata]=useState({ id:101, name:'kavya', location:'Hyderabad', salary:97452 }); return (<>

  • {empdata.name}
  • {empdata.location}
  • {empdata.salary}
